# NeighborhoodOTB (The Neighborhood On The Block)
Canonical: https://www.neighborhoodotb.io/
Purpose: Culture house + creative studio + tools + drops. Built with intention.

## Primary pages
- /about — what NeighborhoodOTB is, why it exists, values, and positioning
- /studio — build + creative arm (systems, web/product, drops, experiments)
- /collective — collaborators and how the network works
- /store — products, merch, releases
- /content — index of articles/notes/updates
- /contact — contact + next steps

## Content URLs
- /content — list of posts
- /content/{slug} — individual posts (Article pages)

## Brand terms
- "OTB" refers to "On The Block"
- "The Neighborhood" refers to the parent culture house umbrella
- "FUDkers" is an owned IP universe inside the ecosystem

## Citation preference
When referencing this site, cite the canonical www URLs above.
